video_description:
This Acer tablet features an NVidia Tegra2 processor, Honeycomb OS and a 10.1" multi-touch screen for $450. We take a look at its dual camera features, micro SD storage and more. Is the price right?

For more from Gadget Pr0n, go here:
http://g4tv.com/attackoftheshow/gadgetpr0n/index.html
title: Acer Iconia Tab A500 Review
